RFLOMICS-install-docker

Charif Dephine

6/26/2022

RFLOMICS-install-docker.Rmd

Install Docker-desktop and git

https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ https://git-scm.com/book/fr/v2/D%C3%A9marrage-rapide-Installation-de-Git

Linux

  • clone Dockerfile
https://forgemia.inra.fr/flomics/rflomics/-/blob/develop.0.1/Dockerfile
git clone --branch develop.0.1 https://forgemia.inra.fr/flomics/rflomics.git
  • Build Docker Image
cd RFLOMICS
docker build --file=Dockerfile --tag=rflomics .
  • Run Docker
docker run -it -p 3838:3838 -v ${HOME}:/root --name='rflomics' --cpus 8 rflomics
  • Start/Stop
docker stop rflomics
docker start rflomics
  • remove
docker rm rflomics

Install RFLOMICS on your current version of R: 

remotes::install_gitlab(repo="flomics/rflomics@develop.0.1",host="https://forgemia.inra.fr/")
library(RFLOMICS)
RFLOMICS::runApp()

MacOSX

  • command line
  • via the Docker desktop interface

Windows

  • Docker desktop
  • restart
  • wsl2 update
  • capture ecran docker Desktop
